title: Cashew of Pirangi
address: Av. Praia de Pirangi, Parnamirim, RN
description: The world's largest cashew tree—spanning over 8,500 square meters!

title: Natal Dunes State Park
address: R. Eng. Clóvis Arraes, Natal, RN
description: Stunning nature preserve with trails and native fauna.

title: Pirangi Beach
description: Popular beach destination known for warm waters, coastal scenery, and proximity to the world's largest cashew tree.

title: Barreira do Inferno Launch Center
description: Brazil's historic rocket launch site since 1965.

title: Natal Air Force Base
description: Historic military installation dating back to World War II, serving as a strategic air base and hub for aerospace operations in Brazil.

title: Parnamirim City Theater
address: Av. Castor Vieira Régis, Parnamirim, RN
description: Local venue showcasing music, plays, and culture.

title: Aerospace Museum
description: Aviation museum highlighting Brazil’s aerospace history.

title: Parnamirim Downtown
description: Central hub featuring cultural spaces, artisan markets, local events, and historic charm.
